About

Get to know me and how I work

My Background

My name's Seb and I make websites. I've been designing and coding on the web since I was 13 years old, which was over 10 years ago.

My first experience with HTML and CSS was when I used to visit the official Stargate website for the latest news (I was a nerd before I was nerd by the looks of it). Whilst browsing the site I wanted to figure out how it was made, mainly because I wanted to make my own fan-site.

Over the next 6 months or so I built a variety of websites, mostly fan-sites for my favourite TV shows and movies and steadily gained enough experience to start building websites for people I knew.

Growing up I loved discovering new ways of making new things on the web using HTML and CSS. Eventually that lead me into building fully-fledged websites and eventually taking on client work.

What I Do

When it comes down to it sketch, design and code websites from scratch for small to medium sized businesses...but I actually end up doing much more than that.

From SEO (search engine optimisation), to setting up products on your eCommerce store and creating images for your blog posts.

Past the design and code though, at the heart of what I do is offer solutions to your business problems. A nice shiny new websites sound great, but I'm all about creating the right solution to help push your business to the next level, not just stick on a fresh coat of paint.

FAQ

I don't know where to start?!

Don't worry, whether you're a seasoned pro or completely new to this, just send me a message via my contact form. I'll get back to you ASAP to answer any questions you have.

What services do you offer?

I offer website design and development. That includes HTML / CSS sites, WordPress, WooCommerce, Shopify, SEO and more.

How often will I hear from you?

We'll usually talk at least once a week when the project is underway as I'll have questions for you, and you for me, as the project progresses.

What is the best method for communication?

Email is always best, but I use Skype for calls to discuss things that email would only confuse. I'm open to anything you'd like to try, so long as it's easy for us both to communicate.

Do you use templates?

No. I create bespoke designs for all my clients. I have some base code I use for every project which greatly reduces set up time (ultimately reducing cost for you), but all styling and design elements are custom to each project.

Can I see some more of your work?

Of course. If you go to my Dribbble profile, you'll see a large variety of work from many different projects.

How will my project be managed?

Each project tends to go through 4 distinct phases. Those are planning, design, development and launch.

How much input can I have?

As much as you'd like. I really enjoy working with my clients, not against them. My process is built to incorporate you as a huge part, since it's ultimately your business I'm offering my solutions to.

What if I don't like the first design?

That's no problem at all. It happens rarely, but sometimes wires get crossed and things don't turn out as expected. I'm more than happy to work on the design until you've got something that will serve your business the best it can.

Seb is not only great at design and development, but he is a problem solver who always delivers an exceptional quality of work. Highly recommended.

Adam Feber, Director of Marketing at Chargify
